title: What Immortal Hand or Eye?
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Russell Gould Twiggs [ [1898-1991], Pittsburgh, PA; Mr. [1898-1987] and Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA, likely May 1956 until May 11, 1965 [1]; gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, May 1965.

Notes:
[1]. In a letter to Carnegie Institute, dated December 12, 1964, Mrs. Beal wrote that the work "was purchased May 1956 from the exhibition of the Associated Artists I believe." In the same letter, she gives a valuation of $125, which was likely the purchase price.
